title: Gunnar Örn Jónsson
text:
Gunnar Örn Jónsson (born 30 April 1985) is an <a href="Iceland">Iceland</a>ic <a href="soccer">football</a> player, currently playing for Icelandic football club Augnablik Kópavogur.
Club career.
Born in <a href="Reykjav%C3%ADk">Reykjavík</a>, Jónsson began his career with <a href="%C3%9Arvalsdeild">Úrvalsdeild</a> side <a href="Brei%C3%B0ablik%20UBK">Breiðablik</a>, based in <a href="K%C3%B3pavogur">Kópavogur</a> in 2002. After good performances with Breiðablik in the 2007 season he was signed by the giants of Icelandic football <a href="Knattspyrnuf%C3%A9lag%20Reykjav%C3%ADkur">KR</a> before the 2008 season.
In the <a href="2009%20%C3%9Arvalsdeild">2009 Úrvalsdeild</a> season Jónsson scored 8 goals in 20 league games for <a href="Knattspyrnuf%C3%A9lag%20Reykjav%C3%ADkur">KR</a> and was selected by fellow players as member of the "2009 team of the season". In March 2010 Jónsson played his first game for <a href="Iceland%20national%20football%20team">Iceland</a> against Mexico, coming on as substitute in 0–0 draw. After impressive pre-season in 2010 where <a href="Knattspyrnuf%C3%A9lag%20Reykjav%C3%ADkur">KR</a> won the official pre-season tournament, Jónsson and his teammates were unable to meet the high expectations and finished only 4th in the <a href="2010%20%C3%9Arvalsdeild">2010 Úrvalsdeild</a>.
On 16 April 2015, Jónsson joined Augnablik Kópavogur.
